Course Staff.name: Chris Pyles
Course Staff.blurb: Hi! I'm a fourth-year CS + DS major, and I also teach Data 100. Looking forward to meeting everyon this semester!

Connector Assistants.name: Avantika Ghosh
Connector Assistants.blurb: Hello, my name is Avantika Ghosh and I am a 2nd year student studying Computer Science and Economics. As one of your Connector Assistants in Data 88E, I am very excited to delve deeper into the exciting world of Data Science and Economics this Spring with all of you! I look forward to meeting everyone in my Office Hours.

Connector Assistants.name: Emily Guo
Connector Assistants.blurb: Hey! My name is Emily. I'm a sophomore studying Data Science and Economics. In my free time, I like to travel, listen to music, and watch YouTube videos. Looking forward to meeting you all this semester!
